1.author: Monica Jimenez
1.title: Why Do We Like Horror Movies?
1.description: Malcolm Turvey, director of the Film and Media Studies program, explains the attraction to the dark side

2.author: Dawn Stobbart
2.title: Stephen King: a master of horror who finds terror in the everyday
2.description: Stephen King is one of the most successful authors in the world – not bad for an English teacher who threw his first novel in the bin to be rescued by his wife Tabitha, who convinced him to publish it.

3.author: Brian Hoyle
3.title: Horror film festivals: the truth
3.description: Why do their best screenings never make it to multiplexes?
